mkr
Interface Build.Run

Enclosing class:
Build
public static interface Build.Run

The main interface through which a build controller is started

Method Summary
 void run(Build.Run outer, java.lang.Class<?> type, java.lang.String... args)
          The initial entry point for the build.
 void runOuter(java.lang.Object builder, java.lang.String[] args)
          This method is a callback invoked by the base Run.run code.
 

Method Detail

run

void run(Build.Run outer,
         java.lang.Class<?> type,
         java.lang.String... args)
The initial entry point for the build. An implementation should store a reference to outer, and then call parent(Run.class).run(this, ....)

Parameters:
outer - the external invoker, which should be stored for the subsequent runOuter call
type - the build class
args - user-supplied parameters

runOuter

void runOuter(java.lang.Object builder,
              java.lang.String[] args)
              throws java.lang.Exception
This method is a callback invoked by the base Run.run code. An implementation should chain call outer.runOuter(builder, ...), using the value of outer passed to run, enclosing this call with any desired exception handling

Parameters:
builder - a build object instantiated from the build class
args - user-supplied parameters
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - any exceptions that should be left to inherited exception handling
